data.title: The Greatest Danish Football Players
data.meta_description: The World would have been much poorer without these famous Danish Football Players!
data.text:

Christian Eriksen

(Danish Professional Footballer Who Plays as a Midfielder)

27

17

Birthdate: February 14, 1992

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Middelfart, Denmark

Five-time Danish Football Player of the Year Christian Eriksen has gained fame as a Tottenham Hotspur midfielder, and now plays for Inter Milan. He has been Hotspur’s Player of the Year twice and became the only player apart from Beckham to score 10+ assists in four successive Premier League seasons.

Nicklas Bendtner

(Danish Former Professional Football Player Who Played as a Forward)

24

Birthdate: January 16, 1988

Sun Sign: Capricorn

Birthplace: Copenhagen, Denmark

Nicklas Bendtner is a Danish football player. A tall and physically strong player, Nicklas Bendtner possesses a powerful header, which he often uses to good effect. Throughout the course of his career, he has played for popular teams like Arsenal Football Club and Juventus Football Club. He also represented his national team at the 2010 FIFA World Cup.

Winston Reid is a New Zealand football player and the current captain of the national football team. In 2011 and 2014, he was adjudged New Zealand Footballer of the Year. Apart from playing for his national team, Winston Reid has also represented popular clubs like West Ham United and Sporting Kansas City.

(Bissau-Guinean Football Centre-Back)

6

Birthdate: November 17, 1988

Sun Sign: Scorpio

Birthplace: Bissau, Guinea-Bissau

Bissau-Guinean professional football centre-back Edigerson Gomes began his senior club-career with Herlev IF and then represented other clubs including HB Køge. His second stint with the latter was cut-short after his contract with the club was terminated by mutual agreement in early 2022. He represented Denmark Olympic during 2016 Summer Olympics and is currently part of the Guinea-Bissau national team.
